statements: SELECT class_id, class_date, class_time, instructor_id, duration_in_hours FROM class_schedule;
SELECT instructor_id, class_date, duration_in_hours, class_time, class_id FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_id, class_time, duration_in_hours, instructor_id, class_date FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_date, duration_in_hours, instructor_id, class_time, class_id FROM class_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT class_date, class_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_date, duration_in_hours FROM class_schedule WHERE duration_in_hours > 2;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_time ASC, class_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(class_id) AS class_count FROM class_schedule GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING COUNT(class_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ClassSchedule;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_date = '2023-06-15';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM ParticipantInformation WHERE participant_phone = '+123456789';
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM ClassSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ParticipantInformation ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClassSchedule WHERE start_time >= '10:00:00' ORDER BY class_date DESC, start_time ASC
SELECT class_id, instructor_name FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM ClassSchedule WHERE class_date = '2022-05-10' AND end_time < '15:00:00'
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_phone FROM ParticipantInformation WHERE participant_address LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_phone FROM ParticipantInformation WHERE participant_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT schedule_id, class_date, instructor_id FROM schedules WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, class_date, class_time FROM schedules ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT form_id, participant_id, rating FROM feedback_forms WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE location = 'Room 101' ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC
SELECT participants.first_name, participants.last_name, schedules.class_date, schedules.class_time FROM participants JOIN schedules ON participants.participant_id = schedules.instructor_id

SELECT schedules.*, participants.first_name AS instructor_first_name, participants.last_name AS instructor_last_name FROM schedules JOIN participants ON schedules.instructor_id = participants.participant_id WHERE schedules.schedule_id = 3
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_classes FROM feedback_forms GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_classes > 3
SELECT schedule_id, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_feedbacks, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM feedback_forms GROUP BY schedule_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM class_schedule;
SELECT class_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date = '2022-09-30';
SELECT full_name, email FROM participant_info WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT location_name, address FROM workshop_location ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_form WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_schedule WHERE class_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT class_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';

SELECT participant_info.full_name, feedback_form.feedback_text FROM participant_info INNER JOIN feedback_form ON participant_info.participant_id = feedback_form.participant_id WHERE participant_info.email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM workshop_location WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT class_id, class_date, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedule ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM class_schedules;
SELECT class_date, class_time FROM class_schedules WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_date, class_duration FROM class_schedules WHERE class_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_phone FROM participants WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM class_schedules ORDER BY class_date DESC, class_time ASC;
SELECT class_id, class_date, class_time FROM class_schedules WHERE class_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_phone LIKE '(555)%';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email, instructor_phone FROM instructors WHERE instructor_name ILIKE 'm%';
SELECT * FROM feedback_forms WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
